page.title: 01THE SURVEY AREA IN GENERAL.
page.content: The{SURVEY AREA}covers the{MAJORITY}of Rudgwick{PARISH.}Consisting of{4}areas {-THE HAVEN, BUCKS GREEN,TISMANS COMMON and{RUDGWICK}the area is predominantly {RURAL}in character. The landscape con- sists mainly of{FARMLAND}&{MIXED WOOD- {LAND}adjoining which, are{RESIDENTIAL areas and a selection of{AMENITIES-}a {VILLAGE HALL,PUBS,SCHOOLS,CHAPEL,P.O., and a{CHURCH.}The village's growth has occurred along the{A281 HORSHAM-GUILD- {FORD}road & the{B2128}which runs{NORTH through the village to{CRANLEIGH.}The} village enjoys numerous{BRIDLEWAYS}and {FOOTPATHS}but is also close to larger {SETTLEMENTS}at{HORSHAM (11km)}&{GUILD- {FORD (19km).}The area has mainly clay soils providing a vital{RAW-MATERIAL} for the local{BRICKWORKS.}The{R.ARUN of the{R.ARUN}causing dramatic floods occasionally. The{POPULATION}of{2255 can enjoy several{CLUBS}&{SOCIETIES.
